title: George Edward
author: George Edward
content: Hello everyone,I am thrilled to be part of this amazing community of like-minded individuals who share a common interest and passion for the world of Bitcoin. My journey here is one filled with excitement and humility as I embark on a quest to expand my knowledge and understanding of Bitcoin.While I may not be well-versed in the intricacies of the Bitcoin world just yet, I am wholeheartedly committed to learning from each and every one of you. I believe that this community is a treasure trove of wisdom, and I am eager to tap into your collective expertise to navigate the platform effectively and make a positive contribution.As a newcomer, I value the insights of the experienced members who have been here before me. Your guidance and knowledge will be invaluable on my journey. So, if there's anything you'd like to share or any advice you can offer about this forum, please don't hesitate to enlighten me.I look forward to engaging with all of you, learning from your experiences, and growing together in the fascinating world of Bitcoin. Thank you for welcoming me into this incredible community.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.created_time: October 08, 2023, 06:42:02 PMLast edit: October 08, 2023, 06:55:56 PM by Hatchy
comments.body: welcome to Bitcointalk op(original poster) it's nice to have someone here who is so excited to know more about Bitcoin. well you found the right place. here in Bitcointalk, there are a lot of well experienced and knowledgeable members who will guide you all throughout your journey as a newbie in the Bitcoin world.  what ever questions you might have in mind feel free to ask them or you can use the search buttons located at the top part of the forum to check for what ever information you require about Bitcoin or the forum. firstly, I would want you to go through the rules of the forum located Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQFuther more, if you want to know more about Bitcoin and how the Blockchain works, I would also recommend you to check out this threads and links, they will help you a long way as a beginner.1.Beginners & Help Encyclopedia2.https://learnmeabitcoin.com/3.Mastering BitcoinI guess this will be all for now other members will be here to guide you with more hints as a newbie.just make sure you obey rules of the forum and be an active member in no time, you will notice your improvement.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Are you an AI?Someone has a similar topic created yesterday or a day ago.And look Copyleaks flag your content as AI-generated with very fast response by Hatchy(for 2 minutes).As a newcomer, if you are a person and not an AI you should read the sticky thread posted in this section since you know how to create a thread you should also know how to read sticky threads it should be a good source for newbies to learn about the forum and Bitcoin.

comments.author: goxcraft
comments.body: The best way to learn from this forum through that "SEARCH" button at the top. Since you just joined, it can be somehow uncomfortable for you. So I'm giving you some topics you should consider reading.Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQNewbies - Read before postingBitcointalk Posting EtiquetteMake Your Topic Title, Posts More AttractiveCampaign to Improve Posting Quality for Local BoardsTopic Title Style Guide[GUIDE] Bitcointalk Forum Etiquette

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: George Edward on October 08, 2023, 06:40:42 PMHello everyone,~Hey there! Welcome to bicointalk.org. This forum is just like other ones with people using it daily without issue.  Makes me wonder why you think you need special help getting started.Why not take a little exploration journey on your own? But yeah, ask away if you really got questions!

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on October 08, 2023, 06:56:21 PMAre you an AI?Someone has a similar topic created yesterday or a day ago.If you take a look at the beginners' section a similar kind of thread is created by newbies every day,Rule and regulations for newbieHello, Newbie here needs guidanceI started a new journey today in BitcoinI can find at least three similar threads in the first two pages and this goes on every page.I wonder if these newbies are smart enough to find B&H section then why don't read the similar threads that exist already, just go on and create a new one for themselves?Moreover, they won't even revisit the thread again and engage in the discussion.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: The beginners and help board does not mean it should be a place to ask very obvious question, yes you may be new to the forum but except you have been under the Rock there are some very obvious question you can sort out yourself. Firstly the fact that you located this board shows that you can actually read and the post below actually asked you to read it.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1689727.0There are lots of post like it that has been pinned both on this board and on the Meta board and they are meant to give you the very needed guide to help you warm into the forum.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk George Edward, we have so many Newbies coming up with different questions and request for guide from senior colleges and after been given words of advices, links and good books that can guide and help them understand bitcoin as well as the forum in general, some of them end up not using it and end up committing some offence in the forum which plagiarism is one of them, I hope you will make good use of all the recommendations and advices given to you.Quote from: George Edward on October 08, 2023, 06:40:42 PMAs a newcomer, I value the insights of the experienced members who have been here before me. Your guidance and knowledge will be invaluable on my journey. So, if there's anything you'd like to share or any advice you can offer about this forum, please don't hesitate to enlighten me.I look forward to engaging with all of you, learning from your experiences, and growing together in the fascinating world of Bitcoin. Thank you for welcoming me into this incredible community.Many useful threads and links were already provided for you to have a look and gain all the necessary knowledge you seek, you can come back here and ask question if you get confused along the way.Consistency will be the driving force towards your learning in this forum, and if you are very good and consistent, the sky will be your limit.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: After reading the forum rules and other pinned threads here in the forum then you should check this thread by Ratimov which lists the different thread that you can check like account securities such as 2FA Authentication and more. Here's the thread Beginners & Help Encyclopedia. Don't forget to use the search bar if you are looking for something. Don't also forgot that more reading means you will gain more knowledge and the more knowledge you gain is the more ways you can find a way to earn money like investment, trading and more. Good luck mate.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: A very good welcome to the family young lad!This is a great platform that will give a whole bunch of information on everything crypto, bitcoin, also build your wealth creation mentality.The threads that have been created already are reach and filled with loads of information for your consumption so just take your time and go through them, learn patiently and when you have reasonable contribution to make, don't hesitate to do so.One love!

comments.author: Ahli38
comments.body: First of all, I warmly welcome you friends by saying welcome. I'm happy when newbies come to this forum. And I would be happier if you also became an active user and take part in discussions here. And don't hesitate to ask anything you want to know. Because members of this forum will be happy to answer your questions. Increasing insight by actively discussing is indeed the best way because there is a reciprocal process that makes it easier for us to remember things that we previously did not know. It's different from just reading from a book which is sometimes difficult to remember even though it has been collected more completely. But through discussion or direct interaction, everything will go easier. What you have to do now is read every rule in this forum if you want to learn here while joining in the discussion. After that, please go around and read topics that might be interesting for you to know. And if something is not clear then ask by replying to an existing topic. The point is, enjoy the process.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: You are free to do whatever you want from this forum but not by engaging in evil activities, and for you to last long here you must be a reader and not just a poster because many people who turned into poster and teachers ended up being wiped so easily as they quickly gets themselves involved with copy and pasting contents from other site without following proper rules. Then I will also want to tell you another that each and every board always have their rules pinned on the top before any other post, so i will also encouraged you to open and read before posting whatever you wishes otherwise it may results being panelized it goes against with the forum rules.

comments.author: Out of mind
comments.body: Since you are related to this forum, I think you can easily understand about bitcoin and business. Also, there is nothing to give you enough knowledge so if you want to read many people in this forum have already made various guides for newbies. If you read well about Bitcoin and its beginners then surely you will understand, and easily you will be able to consider different aspects of Bitcoin. Many users have given you the required threads which are reserved for you, so read and know them. Also, the forum has enough topics to teach you continuously so keep doing them. You can easily learn about Bitcoin and how investing will make you profitable and when to invest and when market volatility starts and how everything starts if you read them. I request you to go through all these posts, if you read them you will easily understand that as you are a newbie you need to learn enough.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1689727.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1631151.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1629118.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0

comments.author: George Edward
comments.body: Thank you all for welcoming me , i really do look forward to my growth in the bitcoin community. i will make sure to go through the guidelines that have been recommended and stated here by you all, once again, i am happy to be here.

comments.author: Ronsbit
comments.body: You are welcome mate. I  can see that other members here have given you links to post and materials that could be of good help to you here. I will only tell you to read them well so you can understand and know the technicalities involved and how things are done here. I believe you will like it. Do well to ask your question if you find anything confusing and want proper knowledge about it as there are lots of people here to help you scale through successfully in learning more about the platform.

comments.author: AYOBA
comments.body: Hello, mate. Welcome to the Bitcointalk If you take your time and carefully analyze the policies of this place, you won't ever regret joining this beautiful forum. Here, you can see how focusing on your starting point will help you reach your goals. I'm always delighted when a newcomer like me introduces themself here. because it has always encouraged me to study more about experiences that I never go through. So that I will be able to respond to any queries or requests for clarification. Furthermore It would also be beneficial if you could take your time and go through some of the links that our participants have provided. I think it will assist you, and you can pick up a lot of knowledge there. We also have a discussion section's that will aid your journey if you visit them and read some pasted threads.

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.body: Quote from: George Edward on October 08, 2023, 06:40:42 PMHello everyone,I am thrilled to be part of this amazing community of like-minded individuals who share a common interest and passion for the world of Bitcoin. My journey here is one filled with excitement and humility as I embark on a quest to expand my knowledge and understanding of Bitcoin.While I may not be well-versed in the intricacies of the Bitcoin world just yet, I am wholeheartedly committed to learning from each and every one of you. I believe that this community is a treasure trove of wisdom, and I am eager to tap into your collective expertise to navigate the platform effectively and make a positive contribution.As a newcomer, I value the insights of the experienced members who have been here before me. Your guidance and knowledge will be invaluable on my journey. So, if there's anything you'd like to share or any advice you can offer about this forum, please don't hesitate to enlighten me.I look forward to engaging with all of you, learning from your experiences, and growing together in the fascinating world of Bitcoin. Thank you for welcoming me into this incredible community.The forum has a lot of person's with lots of experience on bitcoin and cryptocurrency in general, that you can tap from their wealth of knowledge. on your own side, you need to strictly abide by the rules of the the forum, like you have to follow the rules religiously. You are free to ask bitcoin questions you don't have answers to here on the forum. Some members on this thread have already dropped some links for you to follow through and get some more insight about the forum.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Quote from: George Edward on October 08, 2023, 06:40:42 PMHello everyone,I am thrilled to be part of this amazing community of like-minded individuals who share a common interest and passion for the world of Bitcoin. My journey here is one filled with excitement and humility as I embark on a quest to expand my knowledge and understanding of Bitcoin.While I may not be well-versed in the intricacies of the Bitcoin world just yet, I am wholeheartedly committed to learning from each and every one of you. Your guidance and knowledge will be invaluable on my journey. So, if there's anything you'd like to share or any advice you can offer about this forum, please don't hesitate to enlighten me.I look forward to engaging with all of you, learning from your experiences, and growing together in the fascinating world of Bitcoin. Thank you for welcoming me into this incredible community.Welcome to the one stop where you get all the value information about Bitcoin and crypto at large but that's totally dependant on why you are here so it rest on you. Well as you said the insight of those who have being here before you is good but also your research is also important because you need to make research on the purpose of your stay here and then ask questions so that you can be properly guided. Be sure that you always read and browse the forum at times of convenience and be sure to join in conversation you are conversant with Because it will help you grow.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: Quote from: George Edward on October 09, 2023, 08:54:36 AMThank you all for welcoming me , i really do look forward to my growth in the bitcoin community. i will make sure to go through the guidelines that have been recommended and stated here by you all, once again, i am happy to be here. Growth will be there if you focus more on learning and give your time to it and also try to explore different boards on forums where you can read the pinned threads for your help giving you brief ideas but try to be original in your content not plagiarizing others work that will get you banned eventually.Best wishes to you for your growth.

comments.author: Sebas.tian
comments.body: Do everything possible within your capacity to acquire the knowledge of Bitcoin for you to be able to enjoy the benefits that attached to this forum and other local board forum too. Ensure you know all the rules in the Bitcointalk to have a solid freedom in the forum to do anything that will make you improve higher in your journey, because many members here pass through this newbies stage before they became a professional in the community, which you can do the same thing to get to where they are in the future. Before you do everything or someone recommend you to anything in this forum, ensure you do everything possible to carry out research to know how good it is before carry out any operation.
